title.narrative: # of women and youth involved in politics who feel they are able to participate in decision-making processes

description.narrative: # of women and youth involved in politics who feel they are able to participate in decision-making processes

comment.narrative: : 24/60 of women involved in politics feel that they are able to take part in decision-making 8/29 of youth involved in politics that feel that they are able to take part in decision making processes much or very much
Given the current difficult situation in the country, programme will aim to maintain 40% (40/100) of women involved in politics to report that they are able to take part in decision-making processes
